title: Masjids are closed, can we do Itikaf at Home
transcript: mahfoud says we don't have erticaf due to the closure of masjids can we do it home the answer is no erticaf can only be performed in a full-fledged masjid it cannot be performed in a prayer hall or a muslim or so you guys i don't know i've lost the language um so this is not permissible except in a full-fledged masjid if it's closed then allah will give you intention uh reward according to your intention insha allah you
